actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 4, 1897, to increase the value limitation on the amount of forest products which the Secretary of Agriculture may sell without advertisement.

summary.text: Increases the value limitation on the amount of forest products which the Secretary of Agriculture may sell without advertisement to $10,000 (now $2,000). (Amends 16 U.S.C. 476)

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 4, 1897, to increase the value limitation on the amount of forest products which the Secretary of Agriculture may sell without advertisement.
